description:
The world of hell, Pandemonum, is made up of fallen angels. Mullin is excited to work under Beelzebub, a demon which he has always looked up to… But things don’t exactly go as planned.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boy Meets Fluffy Girl. / Her Highness Knows Not Her Assistant`s Heart.
Boy Meets Mofumi Girl. / Kinji no Kokoro, Kakka Shirazu.
Boy Meets Softness Girl / Son Excellence ne connaît pas le cœur de son assistant
ボーイ・ミーツ・モフみガール. / 近侍の心, 閣下知らず.
